articles.title: A Latin American experiment in socialism could be nearing its end - The Washington Post
articles.description: Evo Morales was credited with lifting millions out of poverty and nurturing a growing middle class. But now Bolivia appears to be shifting rightward.
articles.content: SHINAHOTA, Bolivia For nearly two decades, politics in Bolivia has been dominated by one man. Evo Morales, acolyte of Fidel Castro and Hugo Chávez, antagonist of the United States,was credited with l… [+118 chars]

articles.title: New blood pressure guidelines by American Heart Association: Key takeaways - The Times of India
articles.description: AHA/ACC release new blood pressure guideline
articles.content: Adults should limit sodium to 2,300 mg daily, ideally 1,500 mg, following a heart-healthy plan like DASH with fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy oils. Reduce alcoholless or … [+48 chars]

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Just Had the Biggest Controversy of Her Career. Now What? - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Experts weigh in on where the 27-year-old actress goes after being at the center of the storm involving an American Eagle jeans campaign that had everyone from Donald Trump to Lizzo sharing hot takes.
articles.content:
‘Tis the season of Sydney Sweeney. It just now comes with an asterisk.
The two-time Emmy nominated actress, producer, Ford aficionado and booked-and-busy brand partner is revving up for the busiest … [+9499 chars]
